summary: Edits Faendal  with keeping to vanilla . lower his complexion and a few other tweaks , also removes all crime tags and sets him to all crime so he has no problems with crimes . also sets him essential and adds a healing spell  so he can heal himself
descriptionHtml: Edits Faendal  with keeping to vanilla . lower his complexion and a few other tweaks , also removes all crime tags and sets him to all crime so he has no problems with crimes . also sets him essential and adds a healing spell so he can heal himself. this is for people who like faendal  but find his complexion annoying . or want him to be a follower fit for "less than good" people .  ps i know using textures make him look better but his old complexion still makes it look weird so editssss .
author: Wastelandwanderer101
